tweet: Sex is like rollercoasters- You wait patiently to get on, get strapped in, the anticipation builds and in 2mins it's over...
Note to self- next time you don't "feel good" when leaving home, just stay in. It's safer! Gdnyt folks :)
Note to self- next time you bribe a police officer R50 but only have a R100 note, do not ask for change...
Note to self- if in handcuffs and you do not have a key, R50 works suprisingly well...
Note to self- when in handcuffs explaining a story to police crying does not help, I repeat, do not cry...
